com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.boxes
Class WorkAreaPanel

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Panel
              com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SimplePanel
                  com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.boxes.WorkAreaPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
LayoutChangeListener, HasAttachHandlers, HasHandlers, EventListener, AcceptsOneWidget, HasOneWidget, HasWidgets, HasWidgets.ForIsWidget, IsWidget, Iterable<Widget>
public final class WorkAreaPanel
extends SimplePanel
implements LayoutChangeListener

Desktop-like container for boxes.

Implements a panel which arranges boxes in columns. Boxes can be dragged from one column to another or to a different position within the same column.

See Also:
Box
